definitions.totalRevenue: Total Revenue generated from orders within the selected period.
definitions.totalOrders: Total number of orders placed within the selected period.
definitions.totalClubMemberships: Total number of new club memberships acquired within the selected period.
definitions.wineBottleConversionRate: Percentage of orders that resulted in a new club membership, specifically for wine bottle purchases.
definitions.clubConversionRate: Percentage of orders that resulted in a new club membership, regardless of product type.

strengths: Increased revenue in Q1 and Q2 compared to previous year
Significant growth in bottles sold across all quarters
Improved club conversion rate in Q1
opportunities: Leverage retail service type for higher conversion rates
Focus on increasing average order value in Q2 and Q3
Expand successful club signup strategies from Q1 to other quarters
weaknesses: Declining wine conversion rate in Q1
Lower club conversion rates in Q2 and Q3 compared to goals
Decrease in total orders in Q2 and Q3
threats: Decreasing revenue and guests in Q3

staffPraise.name: Jenny Lee
staffPraise.reason: Exceptional club signup performance in Q3

staffPraise.name: Mina Do
staffPraise.reason: Consistently high average order value across quarters

staffCoaching.name: Jennifer O'Toole
staffCoaching.reason: Low club conversion rate in Q3

staffCoaching.name: Liam Garvey
staffCoaching.reason: Below average wine bottle conversion rate in Q3

recommendations: Implement targeted training to improve club conversion rates in Q2 and Q3
Analyze and replicate successful strategies from retail service type across other service types
Develop personalized coaching plans for underperforming staff members
